blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=185,95,0]Ground Entry/Exit[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
Entry/Exit In relation to the network[virtual-signal=signal-dot][color=185,95,0]L[/color]- left[virtual-signal=signal-dot][color=185,95,0]M[/color] - Middle[virtual-signal=signal-dot][color=185,95,0]R[/color] - Right
You can safely [font=default-bold]super force build[/font] ([color=blue][font=default-bold]Ctrl+Shift+Click[/font][/color]) these over the large power poles on [font=default-bold]Straight or Diagonal[/font] rail sections as long as you don't remove 2 neighbouring ones.
